mapper.insert: insert into sys_role (ROLE_ID,ROLE_NAME, ROLE_CODE,REMARK, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF,UPDATE_DATE,UPDATE_STAFF) values ( #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update sys_role set ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE=#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF=#{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select sr.ROLE_ID, sr.ROLE_NAME,ROLE_CODE from sys_role sr left join sys_staff_role ssr on sr.ROLE_ID = ssr.ROLE_ID where ssr.STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ROLE_ID as value, ROLE_NAME as name from sys_role order by ROLE_ID asc
